C

Card - Class in bidwist
Card -- models playing cards It has 2 public enums: one for the suit, one for the rank It has a framework for handling mouse events.
Card(Card.Rank, Card.Suit) - Constructor for class bidwist.Card
A card is identified by its rank and suit.
Card.Rank - Enum in bidwist
enum Rank used for the "value" of a card.
Card.Suit - Enum in bidwist
enum Suit used for the suit of a card.
CardListener() - Constructor for class bidwist.GUI.CardListener
 
compareTo(Card) - Method in class bidwist.Card
compareTo uses the Rank as the major comparison, the Suit as a secondary one.
createPlayers() - Method in class bidwist.GUI
Creates Players for the game and assigns them cards.
